T.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where (a.id = 538 and d.id = 531 and i.status in (1,6)  and a.is_open_label = 'f' and l.released_at < '2014-06-29' and md.deleted='f' and l.release_status = 2) or (md.id <> 531 and l.release_status = 3) or (a.id <> 538 and md.name = 'Depot2')  or (l.release_status = 1 and l.released_at is NULL) or (a.id = 538 and d.id = 531 and l.released_at > '2014-06-29');

F.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where (a.id = 538 and d.id = 531 and i.status in (1)  and a.is_open_label = 'f' and l.released_at < '2014-06-29' and md.deleted='f' and l.release_status = 2) or (md.id <> 531 and l.release_status = 3) or (a.id <> 538 and md.name = 'Depot2')  or (l.release_status = 1 and l.released_at is NULL) or (a.id = 538 and d.id = 531 and l.released_at > '2014-06-29');
